analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x71d01db8d6a2fbea7f8d434599c237980c234e4c.sol:
	Contract GLAToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x71d01db8d6a2fbea7f8d434599c237980c234e4c.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

GLAToken.retreiveTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0x71d01db8d6a2fbea7f8d434599c237980c234e4c.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(owner,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/2/0x71d01db8d6a2fbea7f8d434599c237980c234e4c.sol)
